entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet run fails: "The specified executable is not a valid application for this OS platform" #30565
  • .NET tool does not seem to find the SDK #30546
  • [NETSDKE2E][Intermittent]With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, "Unhandled exception. System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object." happens when installing Android workload in CLI #30545

Closed

  • ClickOnce Publish fails if two referenced projects have the same file, despite being Excluded from the publish #29368
  • Missing dependency installing sdk 6.0 on Ubuntu 20.04 #30464

PullRequests

Created

  • Better fix for the OSX issues in installer repo #30573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30570
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30569
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Port Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack (#30292) #30557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] generate forwarded type assembly attributes. #30556
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix typo in AliasAssignmentCoordinator.cs #30553

Merged

  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30517
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add readonly keyword for synthesized fields. #30539
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack #30292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump up dependencies and make them fit for Dependabot #30549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.8.0 to 19.9.2 in /eng/dependabot #30550
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump dependencies Verify.Xunit and Verify.DiffPlex to same versions as dotnet/templating #30548

Updated

  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2112911 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK
